						}

								list[i].addEventListener(event, fn, false);
							}
						}

			(function() {
				cp('authenticate', function(err, user) {
					if (err || (!user.isLoggedIn() && !user.hasValidSubscription())) {
						console.log('[SPCP] Taking fast path');
						(function spExecMsg() {
							if (window._sp_ && window._sp_.executeMessaging) {
								if (!window._sp_.config.isSPA) {
									console.warn('[SPCP] Sourcepoint not in SPA mode!');
								} else if (window._sp_.version) {
									console.log('[SPCP] Sourcepoint already running');
								} else {
									console.log('[SPCP] Starting Sourcepoint');
									window._sp_.executeMessaging();
								}
							} else {
								console.log('[SPCP] Sourcepoint not loaded yet. Retrying.');
								setTimeout(spExecMsg, 10);
							}
						})();
					} else {
						console.log('[SPCP] User authenticated with Contentpass');
					}
				});
			})();

          window.OneSignalDeferred = window.OneSignalDeferred || [];
          OneSignalDeferred.push(async function(OneSignal) {
            await OneSignal.init({
              appId: "33b5f1fd-593a-463b-85d4-72b0af659279",
              serviceWorkerOverrideForTypical: true,
              path: "https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/plugins/onesignal-free-web-push-notifications/sdk_files/",
              serviceWorkerParam: { scope: "/wp-content/plugins/onesignal-free-web-push-notifications/sdk_files/push/onesignal/" },
              serviceWorkerPath: "OneSignalSDKWorker.js",
            });
          });

          // Unregister the legacy OneSignal service worker to prevent scope conflicts
          navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistrations().then((registrations) => {
            // Iterate through all registered service workers
            registrations.forEach((registration) => {
              // Check the script URL to identify the specific service worker
              if (registration.active && registration.active.scriptURL.includes('OneSignalSDKWorker.js.php')) {
                // Unregister the service worker
                registration.unregister().then((success) => {
                  if (success) {
                    console.log('OneSignalSW: Successfully unregistered:', registration.active.scriptURL);
                  } else {
                    console.log('OneSignalSW: Failed to unregister:', registration.active.scriptURL);
                  }
                });
              }
            });
          }).catch((error) => {
            console.error('Error fetching service worker registrations:', error);
          });
        </script>

<h3 class="story__headline">The Celeb Traitors&#039; Charlotte Church breaks silence after savage &#039;murder&#039; </h3>
<p class="story__lead">SHOWBIZ recluse Charlotte Church, who retreated from public life a decade ago to set up a wellness sanctuary, said she loved her stint back in the spotlight with the other big stars.</p></a></div>
<div class="story__data"><a class="story__data-item" href="https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/tv-news/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 3&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/www.thesun.co.uk\/tv\/tv-news\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 3&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">News TV</a>

<h3 class="story__headline">Mum-of-four &#039;shot dead on doorstep in chilling case of mistaken identity</h3>
<p class="story__lead">INNOCENT Joanne Penney, 40, was gunned down as she opened the door of a South Wales flat on March 9 earlier this year.</p></a></div>

<h3 class="story__headline">I&#039;m a victim of abuse at the hands of my 9-year-old son&#8230; I feel so much shame</h3></a></div>

<div class="story__copy-container"><a class="" href="https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/37092829/prince-andrew-royal-family-reputation-colin-robertson/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 10&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/www.thesun.co.uk\/news\/37092829\/prince-andrew-royal-family-reputation-colin-robertson\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 10&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><p class="story__kicker">COLIN ROBERTSON</p>
<h3 class="story__headline">Andrew remains remorseless but King must do one thing before it&#039;s too late</h3>
<p class="story__lead">IF Loyd Grossman was to give the Royal Lodge TVs Through The Keyhole treatment, it would stretch to a ten-part series. With no fewer than 30 rooms, it has more in common with a golf hotel than the home of a jobless scrounger.</p></a></div>
<div class="story__data"><a class="story__data-item" href="https://www.thesun.co.uk/sun-club/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 10&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/www.thesun.co.uk\/sun-club\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 10&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><span class="sun-club-slug">Sun Club</span></a>

<div class="story__copy-container"><a class="" href="https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/37095584/eintracht-frankfurt-liverpool-wirtz-ekitike-van-dijk/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 21&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/www.thesun.co.uk\/sport\/37095584\/eintracht-frankfurt-liverpool-wirtz-ekitike-van-dijk\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 21&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}"><p class="story__kicker">FRANKFURT 1 LIVERPOOL 5</p>
<h3 class="story__headline">Florian Wirtz with 2 assists &amp; Hugo Ekitike scores against old club</h3>
<p class="story__lead">LIVERPOOL destroyed Eintracht Frankfurt to regain momentum in the Champions League after their loss at Galatasaray. The Reds endured a stressful start in Frankfurt but Florian Wirtz and Hugo Ekitike shone bright.</p></a></div>
<div class="story__data"><a class="story__data-item" href="https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/champions-league/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 21&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/www.thesun.co.uk\/sport\/football\/champions-league\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 21&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">Champions League</a>

<h3 class="story__headline">Liverpool pay tribute to women&#039;s kit manager just weeks after Matt Beard&#039;s death</h3></a></div>
<div class="story__data"><a class="story__data-item" href="https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/womens-super-league/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 21&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/www.thesun.co.uk\/sport\/football\/womens-super-league\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 2&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 21&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:2}">Women&#039;s Super League</a>

<h3 class="story__headline">Moment shot cheerleader is wheeled by mourners before donating her heart and lungs</h3>
<p class="story__lead">HUNDREDS of people flooded the hallways of an Alabama hospital to say goodbye to Kimber Mills before she died on Tuesday.</p></a></div>

<h3 class="story__headline">Covid vaccine could fight deadly cancers by turbo-charging treatment</h3></a></div>
<div class="story__data"><a class="story__data-item" href="https://www.thesun.co.uk/health/news-health/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 24&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/www.thesun.co.uk\/health\/news-health\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 4&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 24&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:4}">News Health</a>

<h3 class="story__headline">Salt Bae admits his glam new Ibiza restaurant is plagued by reeking PONG</h3></a></div>
<div class="story__data"><a class="story__data-item" href="https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/worldnews/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 26&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/www.thesun.co.uk\/news\/worldnews\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 4&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 26&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:4}">World News</a>
<span class="story__video-icon">

<h3 class="story__headline">Prison guard ADMITS making illicit calls to lag who severed mans leg in attack</h3></a></div>
<div class="story__data"><a class="story__data-item" href="https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/uknews/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 30&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/www.thesun.co.uk\/news\/uknews\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 4&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 30&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:4}">UK News</a>
<span class="story__video-icon">
							<svg width="20" height="20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <path d="M10 20c5.525 0 10-4.475 10-10S15.525 0 10 0 0 4.475 0 10s4.475 10 10 10Zm-2.975-6.175c0 .588.637.95 1.137.638L14.5 10.6a.749.749 0 0 0 0-1.275l-6.338-3.95a.753.753 0 0 0-1.15.638l.013 7.812Z">
</path>
</svg>

						</span>

<h3 class="story__headline">Volvo ES90 is a top notch slab of a saloon but I do have some minor complaints</h3>
<p class="story__lead">THE last time I was at Abbey Road Studios I met Adele, Robbie Williams and Lady Gaga. Honestly did. We squeezed into a Nissan Micra fitted with headrest speakers for a bit of Carpool Karaoke.</p></a></div>
<div class="story__data"><a class="story__data-item" href="https://www.thesun.co.uk/motors/news-motors/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 33&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/www.thesun.co.uk\/motors\/news-motors\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 33&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">News Motors</a>

<h3 class="story__headline">Four easy and cheap ways to keep your home drier to fight off black mould</h3></a></div>
<div class="story__data"><a class="story__data-item" href="https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/tips/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 33&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/www.thesun.co.uk\/money\/tips\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 5&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 33&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:5}">Tips</a>
<span class="story__video-icon">
							<svg width="20" height="20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <path d="M10 20c5.525 0 10-4.475 10-10S15.525 0 10 0 0 4.475 0 10s4.475 10 10 10Zm-2.975-6.175c0 .588.637.95 1.137.638L14.5 10.6a.749.749 0 0 0 0-1.275l-6.338-3.95a.753.753 0 0 0-1.15.638l.013 7.812Z">
</path>

<h3 class="story__headline">Woman fined for pouring coffee dregs down DRAIN &#8211; after three officers confront her</h3>
<p class="story__lead">BURCU Yesilyurt was &quot;shocked&quot; when she was slapped with a 150 fine for emptying her coffee cup down the drain while waiting at a bus stop.</p></a></div>
<div class="story__data"><a class="story__data-item" href="https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/uknews/" tabIndex="" data-ga-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 35&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/www.thesun.co.uk\/news\/uknews\/&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;Slot 1&quot;}" data-ga4-event="{&quot;event_name&quot;:&quot;ux_engagement&quot;,&quot;source_unit&quot;:&quot;Home Page | 5 Large Four | Module 35&quot;,&quot;source_position&quot;:1}">UK News</a>
